main event: An unidentified flying object was detected on ground radar for 15 minutes, showing intermittent pings.
interesting points: The object was noted on radar, moving SE to NW but was not visually identified,The object hovered momentarily at low altitude before accelerating away at high speed,The sighting occurred on the night of May 15, 1962, in Columbus, Georgia,The object was described as having a bright, discoidal shape and yellowish-amber color,No photographic evidence was available for this report.
